about_the_game:
A demo version of the upcoming game by 40 Pound Tiger Studios, Parabolus. This demo will contains the first 6 levels of the game and an arena horde mode. For more information, please check out the Parabolus Steam store page.

prepare For Hypespace!

Parabolus is a shooter with a difference. Zooming around with an overactive trigger finger will only get you so far. You need to think ahead and figure out the best way to approach each group of enemies. Rushing in should only be attempted by experienced pilots.

Features

30 Levels Of Space Action.
Arena mode where you take on an unlimited number of enemies.
Stylised neon glow graphics.
Replayable levels with most having multiple routes to explore.
Risk versus reward gameplay.
Simultaneous gamepad and keyboard support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most 32-bit and 64-bit Linux OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz I5 Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Most 32-bit and 64-bit Linux OS
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz I5 Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Parabolus Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz I5 Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz I5 Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5000 Series or Nvidia's GeForce 400 Series or better.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
